newsitem.title: USA: Fuisz in licensing agreement with ConAgra.
newsitem.headline: Fuisz in licensing agreement with ConAgra.

text.p: Fuisz Technologies Ltd said Monday it has signed an exclusive license agreement for United Specialty Food Ingredients Cos, a unit of ConAgra Inc, to use Fuisz's Shearform technology.

Under a ten-year agreement, Fuisz will receive an initial payment from ConAgra of $2.5 million in license fees, a royalty on sales and, after an agreed return on investment to ConAgra, a share of profits.
The company said ConAgra will also provide funding for its annual food research costs and receive a warrant to buy one million shares of Fuisz common stock at $25.00 per share.
Shares of Fuisz were trading Monday morning at 9-7/8.
Fuisz develops and sells drug delivery and food applications. ConAgra is a diversified international food company. United Specialty Food Ingredients Cos specializes in spices and flavorings.
